DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate effect cold water immersion ( CWI ) post-exercise recovery different duration temperature heart rate variability ( HRV ) index . 100 participant perform protocol jump Wingate test , immediately afterwards immerse cold water , accord characteristic group ( CG : control ; G1 : 5 ' 9±1°C ; G2 : 5 ' 14±1°C ; G3 : 15 ' 9±1°C ; G4 : 15 ' 14±1°C ) . Analyses perform baseline , recuperative technique ( TRec ) CWI 20 , 30 , 40 , 50 60 minute post-exercise . The HRV index average RR interval analysis period ( Mean RR ) , standard deviation normal R-R interval ( SDNN ) , square root mean sum square difference adjacent R-R interval ( RMSSD ) , spectral component low frequency ( VLF ) , low frequency ( LF ) high frequency ( HF ) , scatter point perpendicular line identity Poincaré Plot ( SD1 ) scatter point along line identity ( SD2 ) assess . Comparisons group moment perform use technique analysis variance repeat measure two scheme factor . A significance level p < 0.05 consider .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Cold Water Immersion With Different Dosages ( Duration Temperature Variations ) Heart Rate Variability Post-exercise Recovery
DOC.criteria: male sex healthy age 18 30 year classify physically active International Physical Activity Questionnaire smoker alcoholic use drug influence cardiac autonomic activity cardiovascular , metabolic endocrine disease .
